about.title: About Gaya Massage
paragraphs: At Gaya Massage, we specialize in massage for health and wellness using traditional Thai massage techniques. Located at the heart of Chiang Mai's Sunday walking street, our spa offers authentic Thai massage therapy in a peaceful environment.
Our expert therapists provide traditional Thai massage that combines acupressure, stretching, and therapeutic techniques to promote health, reduce stress, and improve overall well-being.

bookingInfo.title: Advance Booking
bookingInfo.description: We recommend booking at least 2 hours in advance to secure your preferred time slot, especially during weekends and holidays.

bookingInfo.title: Payment Methods
bookingInfo.description: We accept cash and Thai PromptPay QR payments. Payment is due at the time of service or upon booking for packages.

bookingInfo.title: Cancellation Policy
bookingInfo.description: Free cancellation up to 1 hour before your appointment.

bookingInfo.title: What to Bring
bookingInfo.description: We provide all necessary linens and towels. Wear comfortable clothing and arrive 10 minutes early to relax.
